```{r, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(tmap)
library(shiny)
library(plotly)

fire <- st_read("Fire_Output.shp")
rx_fire <- st_read(".", layer = "nonfire_rx_Output")
rx_nonfire <- st_read(".", layer = "nonfire_rx_Output")
county_pop <- read_csv("ca_county_pop.csv")

```


```{r}


fire_year <- fire %>% 
  select(YEAR_, FIRE_NAME, Shape_Area) %>% 
  filter(YEAR_ ==  "2000" | YEAR_ == "2001" | YEAR_ == "2002")
  


fire_trans_2007 <- st_transform(fire_year, crs = 4326)


leaflet(fire_trans_2007) %>% 
  addPolygons()
```


```{r}

fire_map <- ggplot(fire_year) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = Shape_Area))
fire_map

```
